author: Journal Inquirer Staff
title: Indians' adjustments pay off
text:
Indians' adjustments pay off By Journal Inquirer Staff Journal Inquirer | 0 comments 
Manchester High boys soccer coach John Tedesco only had a few words to say at halftime of the Indians’ game at Hartford Public on Wednesday. 
The message got through loud and clear. 
Manchester exploded for five second-half goals, including three in the final 12 minutes, to pick up a 6-2 win over the Owls in a Central Connecticut Conference North game. kAm%96 x?5:2?D Wd\e\_X H6?E E@ :?E6C>:DD:@?
